attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To increase or re-adjust the methods of sentencing for crimes thats are committed against people or against property, as in the old saying "Life means Life!", if the person is to serve 10years in prison for crimes committed then he must serve 10years NOT 5years or 3years for good behavior, something needs to be done about the crime wave that britain is building up at this very moment, our country does not deserve to be called GREAT Britain, whats so GREAT about it, neither UNITED or KINGDOM, we are NOT united, and it certainly is NOT a KINGDOM, we let ourselves down everyday, and crime is the key issue that needs solving.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
